thread.section_title: Foreign and national political news and analysis - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Obama says 'it's about the families' after Oregon meeting
thread.title_full: Obama says 'it's about the families' after Oregon meeting - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kevin Freking, Associated Press
title: Obama says 'it's about the families' after Oregon meeting
text: Photo: JOSHUA TRUJILLO, SEATTLEPI.COM President Barack Obama holds six month-old Stella Hakam at Boeing Field during a brief visit to Seattle on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. The president stopped in the Seattle area for a fundraiser and event to support Sen. Patty Murray, D-Wash. Obama came to Seattle after a stop in Roseburg, Oregon, where he visited a week after a school shooting there. President Barack Obama holds six month-old Stella Hakam at Boeing... ROSEBURG, Ore. (AP) — President Barack Obama, faced with protests over his meeting Friday with victims of an Oregon shooting, held to his view that something must be done about deadly gun crimes. But given the freshness of the week-old tragedy, he said, "Today, it's about the families." President Barack Obama holds six month-old Stella Hakam at Boeing Field during a brief visit to Seattle on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. The president stopped in the Seattle area for a fundraiser and event to support Sen. Patty Murray, D-Wash. Obama came to Seattle after a stop in Roseburg, Oregon, where he visited a week after a school shooting there. President Barack Obama holds six month-old Stella Hakam at Boeing... ROSEBURG, Ore. (AP) — President Barack Obama, faced with protests over his meeting Friday with victims of an Oregon shooting, held to his view that something must be done about deadly gun crimes. But given the freshness of the week-old tragedy, he said, "Today, it's about the families."
